item.title: By: Balerion
item.dc:creator: Balerion
item.description: Enjoy sleeping on the couch if you win some Tier 4 molds over her (Warrior, Priest, Druid). Just kidding! Gaming with your significant other like a lot of fun, though my girlfriend limits her gaming to Spider Solitaire...
item.content:encoded: Enjoy sleeping on the couch if you win some Tier 4 molds over her (Warrior, Priest, Druid). Just kidding! Gaming with your significant other like a lot of fun, though my girlfriend limits her gaming to Spider Solitaire…

item.description:

item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Evil M
item.dc:creator: Evil M
item.description:
Gaming with the wife is fun. She and I both read AFK gamer, and based on Foton's advice and are almost done making the perfect characters.
I have a 70 epiced rogue and she has a similarly geared Holy Priest in our raiding guild.
However, my prot warrior alt has just hit 60 and will be 70 soon.
We will become Foton's most dreaded combination. A Prot Warrior married to a Holy priest in a raiding guild. Muahahaha.
item.content:encoded:
Gaming with the wife is fun. She and I both read AFK gamer, and based on Foton’s advice and are almost done making the perfect characters.

I have a 70 epiced rogue and she has a similarly geared Holy Priest in our raiding guild.

However, my prot warrior alt has just hit 60 and will be 70 soon.

We will become Foton’s most dreaded combination. A Prot Warrior married to a Holy priest in a raiding guild. Muahahaha.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Ha. If I wanted antiquated moral values I'd get religion, not play a video game. Let's face it---gaming with your spouse is best because you always have someone to call on when you need another hand for an instance run. ;)
item.content:encoded: Ha. If I wanted antiquated moral values I’d get religion, not play a video game. Let’s face it—gaming with your spouse is best because you always have someone to call on when you need another hand for an instance run. ðŸ˜‰
